title: 9/22/17 -  Stop With The Name Calling
description:
Valerie Plame, remember her? She's being bashed for a tweet linking 'America's Jews' to wars ...Ellen DeGeneres and Megyn Kelly have an interesting, semi-tense talk about President Trump...TGIF: It's Bill O'Reilly...the hypocrisy from the left continues ...'Hubris' is the word of the day...butting heads over 'rocket man'...another Cuban missile crisis may be coming ....A Matt Walsh perspective about Sept 23rd..."just be ready" ...Liberal fascism is alive and well ...Millennial CEO John Richards from 'In God We Must' (IGWM.co) joins the show to share his inspiring journey to successful entrepreneurship ...Prayers for Chippy, Glenn Beck's oldest fan.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
